InstructionData.Title: SSYNC3 - Setting Synchronizer (3 devices)
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Setting Mirror​ # Model: SSYNC3-100​ # Synchroize Setting between 3 pairs of devices alias Source1 d0​ alias Source2 d1​ alias Source3 d2​ alias Dest1 d3​ alias Dest2 d4​ alias Dest3 d5​ ​ alias source r0​ alias dest r1​ alias setting r3​ ​ start:​ move source 0 move dest 3 jal copy move source 1 move dest 4 jal copy move source 2 move dest 5 jal copy yield​ j start
copy: bdns dr0 ra bdns dr1 ra l setting dr0 Setting s dr1 Setting setting j ra
